```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# objects in parent.frame (calling env)
parentls <- function() {
  ls(envir = parent.frame())
}

a<-function() {
    x <- 5
    parentls()
}

b <- function() {
    z <- 10
    parentls()
 }

a() # objects in a's environment
b()
parentls()
```
